${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:ShortFuse.NAME: ShortFuse
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn #yExhaust a random card in your discard pile and gain 1 #ypokemonmaster:Spark.

${modID}:Pokeball.NAME: Pokeball
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to Capture an enemy with 10 or less current HP.

${modID}:SafariBall.NAME: Safari Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click this relic to Capture an enemy with 20 or less current HP.

${modID}:FishingKit.NAME: Fishing Kit
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat add a random #ypokemonmaster:Fishing #yRod and two random #ypokemonmaster:Bait cards to your hand.

${modID}:HotPotato.NAME: Hot Potato
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, gain 1 #yTemporary HP.

${modID}:FirstEdition.NAME: First Edition
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b50 #yGold for each Rare card in your deck.

${modID}:Pokedex.NAME: Pokedex
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first turn gain  [E]  and draw #b1 extra card. Increase the number of turns by #b1 for each #b3 unique pokemon in your deck.

${modID}:QuickClaw.NAME: Quick Claw
${modID}:QuickClaw.FLAVOR: Faster than fast, quicker than quick.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn you discard a card, draw 2 cards.

${modID}:RepeatBall.NAME: Repeat Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click this relic to permanently add a copy of a card in your hand to your deck.

${modID}:ChoiceBand.NAME: ChoiceBand
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play exactly 1 card on your turn, remove ALL of your debuffs.
